SEARCH
Package com.gcu.agms.repository.impl

Class JdbcAssignmentRepository

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.agms.repository.impl.JdbcAssignmentRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
AssignmentRepository
@Repository public class JdbcAssignmentRepository extends Object implements AssignmentRepository
JDBC implementation of the AssignmentRepository interface. This class handles data access operations for gate assignments using Spring JDBC.

      public AssignmentModel save(AssignmentModel assignment)
      Description copied from interface: AssignmentRepository
      Save an assignment to the database. If the assignment has no ID, it will be inserted as a new record. If it has an ID, the existing record will be updated.
      Specified by:
      save in interface AssignmentRepository
      Parameters:
      assignment - The assignment to save
      Returns:
      The saved assignment with generated ID (for new records)
